channel.title: Comments on: Net Zero Lords debate 26 June 2019. The Cost of Theresa Mays Legacy. Gummer Emmisions Spitting Image. Ridley, Donaghue and Lilley. Selwyn Gummer wheres the beef? Show me the Money! Climate Change Madness. There is no #ClimateCrisis. #WrongKindofGreen #GrubStreetScience #GrubStreetEnergy #GrubStreetGreenFascism #GrubStreetJournal
channel.description: Exegesis Hermeneutics Flux Capacitor of Truthiness

item.title: By: rogerglewis
item.dc:creator: rogerglewis
item.description:
rogerglewis on July 30, 2019 at 5:03 pm said: Your comment is awaiting moderation. Breaking News!
Greta Thunberg has decided upon reflection that she will no longer sail across the Atlantic But will Walk across instead. She said, ” I am told that walking on Water, is likely within my powers given my ability to see CO2, which no one else is able to do, New York, New York So good it deserves a Second Coming.”
“If my critics saw me walking over the Thames they would say it was because I couldn’t swim”. Margaret Thatcher Read more at https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/margaret_thatcher_127087
item.content:encoded:
rogerglewis on July 30, 2019 at 5:03 pm said:
Your comment is awaiting moderation.
Breaking News!

Greta Thunberg has decided upon reflection that she will no longer sail across the Atlantic But will Walk across instead.
She said, ” I am told that walking on Water, is likely within my powers given my ability to see CO2, which no one else is able to do, New York, New York So good it deserves a Second Coming.”

“If my critics saw me walking over the Thames they would say it was because I couldn’t swim”. Margaret Thatcher
Read more at https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/margaret_thatcher_127087
